output_data.clarification_question: Please specify the exact documented total time (start time to end time) spent by the provider on this combined Evaluation & Management and Psychotherapy session. Time is the primary factor for selecting the appropriate established E/M and psychotherapy add-on codes (9921X + 90838).
output_data.suggested_answer: Given the scope (medication adjustment, safety assessment, therapeutic discussion regarding passive ideation), we anticipate this session lasted 45-53 minutes, supporting 99214/99215 combined with 90838.

primary_code.description: Established patient, Evaluation and Management, Level 4
primary_code.rationale: This session addresses an established patient with Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder (*F33.1*), involves high medical decision making (dosage change from 50mg to 100mg of *Sertraline*, and assessment of passive suicidal ideation), requiring a high-level E/M code.

addon_codes.rationale: The provider engaged in therapeutic discussion regarding depressive symptoms, feelings of failure, guilt, and explored the passive nature of the death ideation, meeting the criteria for the psychotherapy add-on service (typically 30 minutes).

output_data.medical_necessity: Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder, Moderate Severity (*F33.1*), requiring intensive medication management and safety assessment due to persistent symptoms and passive suicidal ideation.
